ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Scattered Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. North wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
